summary: This is a simple mod that adds a preset to Orcs under the Race Menu that allows you to play as my character Grawnk, from my blog An Orc\'s Life: anorcslife.wordpress.com
descriptionHtml:
This is a simple mod that adds a preset to Orcs under the Race Menu that allows you to play as my character Grawnk, from my blog An Orc\'s Life: anorcslife.wordpress.com

To make this work, simply copy Grawnk.esp into your Skyrim Data folder and check the box in your mod manager. Once in game, bring up the race menu, (showracemenu in the console) change the race to Orc, and slide the preset bar all the way to the right, save and exit.
author: kitdoctor
